This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL :user-valid selector should respond to user action promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "SyntaxError: Failed to execute 'matches' on 'Element': ':user-valid' is not a valid selector."
FAIL :user-valid selector properly interacts with submit & reset buttons promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "SyntaxError: Failed to execute 'matches' on 'Element': ':user-valid' is not a valid selector."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
